attributes.comment:
Please consider the great expense of International Adoption placed upon the
adopting parents. It is also a very difficult endeavor to get the issuance of the
I171H form as in many states NO phone number or way to inquire is included with
this already high fee. Our family waited 112 days for our last I171H form. It is not
an infertile couples fault that they can not have children. Adoption is a wonderful
way to enrich a family. Foreign fees are very high and placing more expense upon
the family is makng this situation more difficult. Thank-you!!!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
